column1: early swing, 125kph, way wide of off and called wide
139kph, good length, outside off, swinging away, he fends at it and misses
back of a length, off stump line, he tries to pull but it skids under the bat and over off stump
139kph, fuller length wide of off, he drives on the up to wide mid off and gets one
bouncer, well directed, straight over leg stump, he ducks underneath it
139kph, back of a length, he tucks it off the hip wide of short fine leg
back of a length outside off, he tries to pull but is very late on it, gets it off the sticker to cover
126kph, full outswinger, he drives on the rise wide of mid off for one
134kph, back of a length, he skips down and it bounces a touch more an more than expected, comes off the shoulder of the bat and falls safe short of point
132kph, full swinging into the pads, he misses out on clipping through square, it runs off pad
full outside off, no swing, he drives nicely straight to mid off
130kph, good length, angled across outside off, he pushes from the crease and misses
123kph, half-volley, he climbs into this lofting a drive wide of mid off and it races to the rope!
back of a length, 140kph, he shapes to pull but is forces to defend with the full face
back of a length, outside off, he punches off the back foot to point
136kph, fuller into middle and leg, he clips this behind square and Dunk runs well to pinch a second run
shorter length, 141kph, he tries to pull, it gets onto him quickly and he mistimes through midwicket
good length, 140kph, wide of the crease angled into middle, he defends on the front foot
139kph good length, fourth stump line, he drives on the up wide of mid off
130kph, full into leg stump, he clips this powerfully through midwicket and the sweeper runs from deep square to cut it off
130kph, half volley, he drives hard straight to cover
122kph, full outside, he skips down the track and lofts nicely wide of mid off and it races to the rope!
good length outside off, he stands up and drives on the up between cover and cover-point, the timing is incredible and it runs away from the fielder!
back of a length, he pulls, not off the middle wide of mid on
134kph, good length angled into leg stump, he tries to swing this away on the leg side, gets an inside edge onto pad and it rolls into the gully
136kph, full into leg stump, he mistimes a drive to mid on who is deep and they take on Klinger and beat the throw
good length outside off, he pushes into the gap at cover-point and they take one
cross seam, good length, 132kph, he backs away and swings hard along the ground hitting straight of mid on but not timing it well enough to beat the man on the ring
133kph, bouncer, he tries to pull but it's too high and called wide
back of a length outside off, 135kph, he runs off the open face trying to get it to third man but can't beat a fine backward point
off cutter, leg stump, tucked through forward square, they take on Bosisto running in from the rope and beat him for two
135kph, full outside off, he drives, mistiming to cover
94kph, tossed up in the slot outside off, he slog sweeps and hammers this flat and hard over wide long on into the stands! Huge hit from Gulbis
darted into leg stump, he shuffles out and drives to long on
79kph, slower pace, tossed up, he drives with control to long on

he skips down the track and lofts this nicely inside out over straight mid off, Tye gives chase and he has two bites sliding and pulling it in on the rope. The second touch came with his foot nearly on the rope
full angled into leg stump, he sweeps heard around behind square and picks the gap!
slower and angled into leg, he skips out and defends on the front foot with bat and pad together
82kph, good length leg break, he gives room and cuts hard to deep point
89kph, leg break outside off, he pushes on the front foot wide of cover
86kph, wrong un wide of off, he slices a drive off the edge that runs fine of short third man
86kph, full wrong un, he slogs sweeps and drags it through square leg to the sweeper
tossed up, 88kph, leg break, swings hard with the spin lofting it over midwicket and they push hard for two and get it. 50 partnership
84kph, looped up top spinner, he stays leg side and drives straight to cover
124kph, good length outside off, he pushes off the front foot to point
116kph, slower ball, length on leg, he steps across his crease outside off, tries to pull over short fine, he misses, it just misses leg and is called wide. Tough call given he moved outside off
full on off, driven firmly to long off
slower ball, length, he pulls this through forward square to the wide expanses and they take two
117kph, short slower ball, leg side, he pulls fine but straight to Agar at short fine leg
134kph, good length outside off, he swings hard and hits it flat down to long on
127kph, seam up, full on off, he drives firmly down to long off
87kph, leg break outside off, he gives room and lofts this high over cover and it lands safely in the gap
95kph, fast leg break on off, he reverse lap sweeps and places it beautifully fine of short third man and it races away!
86kph, wrong un on leg, he sweeps hard between square midwicket and deep backward square for two

caught at wide long on! Qadir gets his first BBL wicket! Tossed up leg break, he slog sweeps but with some extra bounce, gets a thick top edge that flies to wide long on, Willey runs to his right and takes an excellent catch in the swirling wind!
89kph, leg break, he clips this with the spin to long on
82kph, knee high full toss on leg, he just paddles to short fine leg for a dot ball! Got away with that
111kph, slower ball, yorker, he squeezes it out straight of cover
133kph low full toss on middle, he clips this straight to midwicket
119kph, short ball into the ribs, he pulls around the corner behind square and they run really well
good length slower ball, 115kph, holds up in the pitch, he tries to force off the back foot and misses

caught behind! 132kph, surprise bouncer! It caught Maddinson out because off all the slower balls before it, and he wants to protect that broken wrist that was hit by Jhye Richardson on this ground a month ago, he jumped up and fended it away off the shoulder of the bat, had no idea were it was, it popped up behind him and Bancroft takes a simple catch!
133kph, good length, top of off, he's back and across and defending to midwicket
80kph, short wide wrong un, too wide and called
leg break, shorter, extra bounce, he tries to reverse sweep and misses
full outside off, he drives firmly wide of long off
87kph, tossed up on off, he drives hard to cover
good length, wrong un, doesn't pick him, beats him fending at it
shorter leg break, he's back and cutting this behind point and they get two
wrong un, tossed up, 85kph, he drives to long off
78kph, tossed up, he skips down and drives straight back to the bowler
slower length ball on middle, he pushes this through midwicket and they look for to but can't take on Cartwright running in
slower, length ball, he skips down and is forced to defend
full and wide, he squeezes this out to short third man
slower and shorter outside off, 80kph, he's back and punching to deep cover
tossed up, he skips out and is driving back to the bowler
wrong un, 82kph, it comes off the pad and runs fine for a leg bye

wrong un, beats him completely as tries to swing down the ground, Bancroft whips the bails off and appeals for a stumping. It goes up to the TV umpire but he just got his toe back into the crease after dragging it out.
79kph, short and wide, he's back and slapping this down to long off
81kph, leg break on middle, he chips this in the air towards long on but well short of the man
85kph, shorter leg break, he's back and cutting hard to deep cover
wrong un, drifting and spinning down leg and it's called wide
87kph, wrong un, pitching outside off, and ripping back, hits the front pad, Qadir appeals but it is too high. No support from the keeper
shorter length 79kph, he sits back and smacks this straight back over the bowler's head and splits long on and long off perfectly!
tossed up, he drives hard down to long on
83kph, tossed up outside off, he skips down and drags this wide of long on and they get two
shorter length, he skips out and then pulls back and cuts to short third man and pinches one
88kph, short drag down, he hangs back and smashes this back over the bowler's head again! It thumps into the sightscreen!
Another one hammered down the ground! Again shorter, again he sits back and slaps it back over Agar's head and again it thumps into the sightscreen on the bounce!
137kph, back of a length on off, he stands up and pushes firmly to cover
135kph, short ball and he steps inside it and hooks it in the air and into the gap one bounce four to deep backward square!
short and wide, he sits back and cuts behind square wide of third man and they run well for two
good length, 131kph, outside off, he cuts to deep point for one

dropped at fine leg by Qadir for six! Short ball, he pulls this with an up and under strike, high to fine leg, Qadir was back on the rope but unsure of how close, he got both hands to it but parried it over! 50 for Dunk
full and wide, too wide and it's called
short ball outside off, he tries to pull, mistimes but it flies towards long on

shorter slower ball, he pulls around to fine leg, Dunk comes for two but Gotch doesn't run, the throw goes to Bancroft at the striker's end, he takes the glove off and throws to Willey but the throw is way wide and the run out is missed! He would have been out!
good length, he pulls this behind square but they only get one this time
dropped by Bosisto at deep midwicket! Short ball, chest high, smashed straight to Bosisto at midwicket, chest high and he drops it! Didn't have to move and it went down
short ball, chest high, he pulls up and over deep backward square who is too far in! It goes over his head and away for four! 50 partnership up

caught at backward point! Agar holds this one! Short slower ball, high outside off, he upper cuts but there's no pace to work with, he just skies to backward point, Agar cruises back a few paces and takes the simple catch
full on the pads, he glances this straight to short fine leg
112kph, slower ball, outside off, he punches off the back foot to cover

bowled him! 140kph full into leg stump, 28kph quicker than the first ball, he was back and trying to whip through the leg side and beaten for pace, it goes through the gate and smashes into leg stump!
132kph, full on leg stump, he clips this through forward square to deep forward square
full outside off, he steps back and across and whips this through midwicket to the sweeper
132kph, high bouncer, he tries to pull but it's too high and called wide
good length slower ball, wide off, he defends this to the gap at point
good length outside off, he tries to cut, gets a bottom edge that bounces to the keeper
133kph, back of a length, he walks down the track, he bunts this back to the bowler
126kph, shorter length, he pulls hard in the air through the big gap at deep midwicket!
124kph, full on off stump, he drives off the toe end of the bat to cover
full, 126kph, into the pads, he clips this through forward square to the man in the deep
109kph, slower ball, full on middle and leg, he swings this hard wide of long on for a couple
124kph, fuller on off, almost a yorker, he digs this out to long on but Merlo was slow to go so two isn't on
135kph, full wide yorker, he backs away and reaches out to squeeze this to cover-point

caught at long on! 116kph slower ball, deceives him, he tries to launch down the ground but gets under it, Coulter-Nile runs in 15m off the rope at long on, camps under it and takes it comfortably enough! The ball nearly took a peak out but no dramas in the end.
134kph, full yorker length down leg, and called wide. Tye argued it was close to leg
full wide yorker, well bowled, he backed away and missed it

caught at long on! Good length on speed delivery in the slot to launch into the stands, but he miscues this down to long on, Coulter-Nile doesn't have to move and takes the catch infront of this chest!
130kph, bouncer, too high and called wide. An error from Tye
good length, 139kph, outside off, he backs away to try and loft over cover and misses
110kph, into leg stump, he clips it to the gap at midwicket and they take on the man and beat the throw
wide full toss, he square drives nicely through point and Cartwright runs from deep cover-point but can't prevent two
110kph, good length slower ball, he backs away and just bunts this to cover
132kph, length ball, wide of off, he backs away and punches this straight to cover but Turner doesn't shy despite the run out being on
slower ball bouncer, 122kph, he pulls off the bottom edge to short fine leg
136kph, full outside off, he moves outside leg and then back outside off, gets hit on the pad and it rolls away
full and straight, he drives straight, it ricochet's off the stumps at non-striker's towards long off, they run hard and get two just beating Tye's throw to the keeper
92kph, drifting into leg, he clips this through forward square to deep midwicket
drifting down leg, he glances this fine of short fine leg for a couple
86kph, drifting into middle, he drives back to the bowler
86kph, shorter length, he pushes towards long off, but Larkin comes across from from cover to cut it off
shorter length, he punches off the back foot to cover and they take a tight one
90kph, drifting into leg stump, he tries to drive hard down the ground but drags it off a thick inside edge through square leg
good length, outside off, he defends from the crease to midwicket
back of a length wide of off, he tries to pull off the front foot and misses as it skids through
130kph, length ball in the slot, on the front foot, he heaves this out of the screws over deep midwicket and it goes way way over the rope! What a sound it made off the bat.
good length on off, 135kph, he defends on the front foot
117kph, shorter slower ball, into the ribs, he tucks it around the corner to short fine leg
137kph, full angled into midwicket, he clips this straight to midwicket
shorter length outside off, he cuts hard to cover-point
94kph, good length on off, he paddle sweeps to short fine leg and they get one
good length outside off, he looked to press forward, went back, chopped a cut shot off the bottom edge fine of short third man
full on leg, he drives to long on
drifting into leg stump, he misses out and comes off pad
tossed up on off, 84kph, he pushes back to the bowler
117kph, length slower ball, pushed to point, they take a tight one, Larkin charges in and fires and misses but he was home
back of a length off cutter slower ball, 118kph, he's back and working wide of short fine
110kph, short slower ball, he pulls hard behind square and they get a couple as the man comes around
he skips down and lofts this nicely straight of mid on, well struck, hitting through the line for four!
132kph, bouncer, he shaped to pull and bailed out and it's not called wide
117kph, leg cutter slower ball on leg, he clips this out to deep midwicket, the call is for two but it's not on
113kph, off cutter slower ball outside off, he slices a chunked drive up and over cover, not well hit but struck well enough to get three
full and wide half-volley and he steers a lovely square drive, timing it past cover-point into the gap and it races away! Nice shot
he advances at a length ball wide of off, he square drives off the bottom edge that runs down to third man
high short ball, he swivels on a pull shot forward of square, they were a chance at two but opted not to take it
slower ball, 114kph, he pushes wide of mid on for an easy single
leg cutter slower ball, 100kph, full on leg, he works this wide of mid on and they can run an easy two here
84kph, good length, defended to midwicket, they look for one but Beer closes it down
tossed up on middle, he skips out and drives back to the bowler
skips down and drives loosely, dragging it to mid on and they take a tight one to Bravo
low full toss, he hammers this freebie through cover and away for four!
90kph, tossed up on middle, he skips down and lofts this just clearing Bravo at mid on and away to the rope!!
drifting into leg stump, he clips this with the drift wide of mid on
slower ball on leg, he clips this through forward square
125kph short ball, pulled in the air into the deep at midwicket
130kph, back of a length outside off, he punches off the back foot through cover-point
102kph, slower ball, full toss, he drives, bouncing into the pitch and back over the bowler's head for one. 50 partnership
125kph, yorker, angled into off, he digs this out, well bowled
126kph, full angled into off, he steps across and whips this through midwicket to the sweeper
84kph, skips down and drives hard to long off
tossed up on middle, he clips this straight to midwicket
tossed up, he drives back to the bowler
shorter length, wide of off, he's back and cutting hard past backward point and it races to the rope, Merlo runs around and makes a good save
tossed up on off, 80kph, he sweeps from off stump behind square
82kph, top spinner on leg, he clips this off the thigh pad wide of fine leg
slower ball, wide of off, he backs away and tries to loft over cover but misses
125kph, back of a length wide of off, he cuts hard wide of third man and they get a couple
137kph, shorter ball, he's back and pulling behind square, doesn't time it but it goes to the man in the deep
110kph, shorter slower ball, into the ribs, he tucks this fine of short fine leg for one
128kph, fuller outside off, he pushes on the front foot to mid off
short ball, chest high, he's back and pulling along the ground to deep backward square
87kph, stock ball into leg stump, he skips down and is taken on the pad
skips down the track and slices this inside out over cover and wide of long off running around and away for four!
86kph, top spinner, he went back across and missed whipping across the line, big appeal, not out, it was too high
tossed up outside off, reverse lap sweep for one to short third man
89kph, short ball down leg, he pulls this around the corner wide of short fine leg for a couple
tossed up, 81kph, he skips down and drives to long on
short slower ball, 122kph, he backs away and tries to cut mistiming it to cover
110kph, leg cutter slower ball, he lofts this in the air towards mid off and it just clear the jumping Nic Maddinson! Just over the finger tips and away for four!

caught and bowled! Shorter length, rib high outside off, he tried to work across the line to midwicket off the back foot, closed the face, got a leading edge that popped up into the leg side, Plunkett runs across and takes the easy catch
134kph, short ball, gets big on him, he pulls bit miscues it off the splice, it only gets to the circle at midwicket and they run well for two
121kph, slower ball, short, he swivels on a pull around to deep backward square
126kph, back of a length outside off, he pushes off the back foot to cover
full toss, he whips this hard to deep midwicket. 50 for Bancroft. Mixed reception from the crowd. Not many cheers
84kph, on off, he defends on the front foot to midwicket
89kph, tossed up outside off, he tries to drive and drags it back to the bowler
full toss, driven hard straight of long off, Dunk has to run and dive to his right to save four
92kph, flatter on leg, he tries to clip it with the angle and misses
tossed up on off, he drives to long off
short ball into the ribs, 120kph, he tries to pull but mistimes off the gloves to short fine leg for one
full outside off, he pushes this slowly to long on, Turner bolts out of the blocks and is back swiftly for two
slower ball, 102kph, he picked it, it's a half-volley, he steps out and lofts it straight down the ground and over the fence!
good length on off, 134kph, he's hit high the pad, it rolls away for a leg bye, too high for LBW
slower ball, full toss, he whips this out through midwicket to the sweeper
125kph, full outside off, he drives hard along the ground to long off
84kph, good length on middle, he skips out, beaten in the air, he thrusts his pad and bat to it, it comes off pad into the leg side
tossed up, full toss, he skips out and drives along the ground to long off

appeal for a stumping! It goes upstairs. He's OUT! He tried to sweep from outside off, missed it, he dragged his back foot out, Gotch whipped the bails off in a flash and knew he had his man. The replay shows he didn't get his back foot back in
88kph, drifting down leg, it comes off the pad and runs for a couple of leg byes
dragged down short and wide, he cuts straight at cover but there's a misfield from Maddinson and it allows a couple
91kph, fuller, he skips down and drives to long on against the turn
78kph, good length, he's back and slapping this down to long off
good length at leg stump, he defends off the back foot
shorter length, he's back and working this through midwicket and they run well
tossed up into the slot, Turner swings through the line hitting against the turn and launching this way back into the crowd at wide long on! Super strike
pushed way wide of off, outside the guidelines, easy call for a wide
72kph, short ball outside off, he has so much time to adjust, smashes a pull shot wide of long on for four!
tossed up outside off, he launches him again, flatter to long on but still over the top and into the crowd! Incredible power from Turner.
115kph off cutter slower ball, he didn't pick it, stopped his pull shot, gets a top edge but it pops up and falls safe at square leg
117kph, pulled hard to deep midwicket, they take on Bravo's throw and beat him! What great running
117kph, leg cutter slower ball, into leg stump, he just pushes to the circle at wide mid on and they run an easy two. This pair is lightning between the stumps
134kph, short ball, he steps inside the line and pulls off the top edge that flies over short fine and again over the fence and down the race in the bowels of the MCG!
slower ball, back of a length, he tries to work to leg, but it comes off the inside edge onto thigh and drops down and Agar calls him through
130kph, full into middle stump, he pushes this to the circle at midwicket and again they pinch two
124kph, full outside off, he drives easily down to long off
slower ball, 98kph way down leg, he gets a little glove on it and it bounces to Gotch so it's not called wide

Bowled him! 105kph change up slower ball completely deceives him! Like a change up in baseball, it was a full toss, Agar skipped down to smash it and it just dipped violently and did him cold, it hit the base of middle. That is exceptional skill from Bravo
bowled him! Two in two! 130kph, yorker tailing down leg, he tried to whip it away behind square, it comes off the inside of his front foot and ricocheted onto leg stump!
105kph, slower ball, full toss that dips again, Bosisto sits back and watches it and defends late
105kph, length slower ball, outside off, he pushes this with an open face through backward point
full outside off, he pushes in the air on the front foot through a vacant cover-point
108kph, slower ball short and wide and he cuts this easily through backward point and there's no one there protecting that ball! Easy boundary
113kph, slower ball, drifting down leg, he tries to glance and misses, it was close to leg but called wide
120kph, short ball over off, he backs away and upper cuts this over backward point, doesn't time it but gets a couple
130kph, bunting to midwicket and running, Bravo has all the time to line up the stumps and run him out and misses!

126kph, bouncer, called no-ball for the second bouncer for the over! Game over. But no one knew. The keeper took it, threw the stumps down, Bosisto was in, but then took off to run as it ricocheted away, Gotch ran in picked it up and broke the stumps and he would have been out but the game was over! Crazy finish
